extendedInfo.description: My DBZ friends, here is another amazing live wallpaper for you :)Super Saiyan 2 live wallpaper is of the one and only saiyan who managed to reach the second stage of a super saiyan - Gohan. During the Cell games, Gohan ascended to the next level for the first time in DBZ history. The transformation made him completely unstoppable, ripping Cell apart while barely exerting an effort. Teen Gohan was incredible.Super Saiyan 2 live wallpaper captures the essence of Gohan turning super saiyan 2. It has a lot of cool effects that you can toggle, such as lightning, debris, body sparks and others! Check out the video, or install the app and see it for yourself! A lot of work went into this wallpaper, so that every DBZ fan can enjoy their most favourite moments on their devices :)If you have a powerful device, you increase Gohan's power level. Be careful, however, as Gohan is extremely strong especially when he is a super saiyan 2. This is only recommended for powerful devices.This app will add a few search access points on your device. If you do not want to use this new search page, you can either ignore it or delete it. If you do use it, we get a few cents and it will help us a lot to keep developing more apps. If you donât, you can delete it and no harm is done (our app remains the same, no need to uninstall it!). Thank you.

reviews.title: Super
reviews.comment: This is my FAVORITE Gohan live wallpaper EVER! It\'s so brilliant, and I like the different tones of colors on gohan\'s AWESOME clothing.
reviews.author: heidy ramirez

reviews.title: Stupid spam!!!!
reviews.comment: Always interrupts and stops what I\'m doing.  I really hate the spams on this app. Take them off and you get 5 stars.

reviews.title: Cool App
reviews.comment: A must-have for every dragon ball z fan. Great effects and cool settings. In one word \"incredible\"

reviews.title: Awesome wallpaper, just one problem though

reviews.title: Cool bg, but annoying ads
